item.title: Orchestrating complex (not complicated) tasks using AWS serverless and Python
item.description:
Description

Python and serverless technologies are a great way to quickly scale a project, but what can you do when things get complicated? Here are some patterns to keep you sane.

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/orchestrating-complex-not-complicated-tasks-using-aws-serverless-and-python

Sun Aug 4 14:50:00 2019 at C3.6
item.dc:creator: Michael Kelly
